main.name: Yacov Medina
main.description: I'm always eager to learn, invent and discover new territories. In everything that I do, I aim to maintain a balance between great user experience and beautiful code
main.bio: I am very highly motivated, responsible, adaptable, quick to learn new skills and driven to complete tasks and challenges. I have experience teaching and tutoring in many areas. I can lead projects, working independently and as a part of a team. In my spare time I enjoy learning Italian, guitar playing, photography, cooking and juggling.
